column5: Anyone know what happened to the site today? Was giving apache errors as if the server crashed and needed a reboot.  Glad to see its back though without any lost info that I can see   I can't see a post on this so I hope I'm not reposting the same questions someone has already
due to the amount of bandwidth we use, we had to be moved to a dedicated server. hopefully this will take care of any downtime.
Oh, that woul also explain the random outages this past month. Thats crazy, a forum using that much bandwidth. It means you it something good going here. Keep it up.
I was actually able to get stuff done at work yesterday!  lol  Today, however...
